Lisa Simpson

1.content: Please pick a character to be tickled
1.title: Pick A Ticklee

choices: Tickled by Marge as punishment for bad behavior
Tickled by Lisa and her friends for their entertainment
Tickled at school as a new form of detention
Tickled in a contest for a prize
Tickled by all his previous girlfriends
11.title: Bart Simpson

choices: Feet
Tummy
Armpits
111.content: Bart! Yelled marge, I told you to clean up your room. I will in a bit said Bart playing video games. You said that a hour ago now do it now, said marge. I will in a bit said Bart. Marge goes and grabs Bart’s arm and drags him to his room. “Clean it up now or I’ll punish you” said marge. “What will you do” ,asked Bart mockingly, strangle me? “You’ll find out if you don’t clean up your room” said marge. A hour goes by and Bart still hasn’t cleaned up his room. That’s it! Said marge, “Bart you are staying in your room until you clean it up, you have till morning or you will be punish” said Marge. Yeah whatever responds Bart. After Bart goes to bed marge sneaks in his room and ties him up. Bart wakes up in the morning with his mother waiting for him to wake up. Bart wakes up with his wrist and ankles tied to the end of his bed. “Hey what gives mom?” Asked Bart. “Well Bart since you didn’t clean your room you left me no choice but to punish you” said marge. What kind of punishment asked Bart. Tickle torture said marge.
111.title: Tickled by Marge as punishment for bad behavior

choices: Tickled by her whole class as extra credit on an assignment
Tickled by Bart for his own personal enjoyment
Tickled by her friends at a sleepover party
Tickled by Millhouse, his dream come true
Tickled by the science club at school as an experiment
12.title: Lisa Simpson

choices: Tickled by the bullies, his worst fear realised
Tickled by a doctor to study an allergy
Tickled by Lisa as payback for always trying to get a date with her
Tickled by girls as the result of a prank by Bart
Tickled by Bart as a dare gone wrong
13.title: Millhouse

choices: Tickled by classmates for telling on them
Tickled by the gym coach to build his endurance
Tickled by girls, his wildest dreams meet his worst nightmares
Tickled by teachers as an after school assignment
Tickled by the bullies until he goes crazy
14.title: Martin Prince

info.brief_description: This interactive story will focus on the children in the show The Simpsons
info.description: Nothing sexual please, just tickling on feet, stomach, armpits, sides and ribs.
